Updates

About

Geek Girls is a VIT exclusive initiative to bring the girl coders, designers and ideators together. It aims to give them a platform to collaborate and work together on new ideas, projects and hacks; bridging the gap between process and product.

The platform is open for all Girls in VIT to join irrespective of your course, year and experience. We appreciate and encourage learning and believe that together we can do great things.

Fill the Form.

Contact Us

Have a query? Want to know what we are upto? Just want to say Hello?! Well, don't hesitate and shoot us an email. We would love to hear from you.


Vellore, India

Open Letter

Open Letter

  • Client: Girls in VIT
  • Date: Januray 2019
  • Service: Letter

Join Us

We hope you have read the open letter and feel the same about the initiative as we do.In which case, you shouldn't delay any further to be a part of the group. There is no hassle really. All you have to do is fill this Form. After filling the form you can start contributing by sharing this form with freinds who you know would like to be a part of it. We truly wish that the Geek in you has a great journey from here. In case of any trouble, Email! :)

  • Date: January 2019
